paragraphs.content: Chapter 15
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 15

paragraphs.content: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

paragraphs.content: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.

paragraphs.content: The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The eyes of the Lord are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

paragraphs.content: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.

paragraphs.content: A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.

paragraphs.content: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.

paragraphs.content: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.

paragraphs.content: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the Lord: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.

paragraphs.content: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the Lord: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.

paragraphs.content: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.

paragraphs.content: Hell and destruction are before the LORD: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hell and destruction are before the Lord: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?

paragraphs.content: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.

paragraphs.content: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.

paragraphs.content: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.

paragraphs.content: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.

paragraphs.content: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Better is little with the fear of the Lord than great treasure and trouble therewith.

paragraphs.content: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.

paragraphs.content: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.

paragraphs.content: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.

paragraphs.content: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.

paragraphs.content: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.

paragraphs.content: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

paragraphs.content: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!
paragraphs.contentHtml: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!

paragraphs.content: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.

paragraphs.content: The LORD will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.

paragraphs.content: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the LORD: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the Lord: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.

paragraphs.content: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.

paragraphs.content: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.

paragraphs.content: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.

paragraphs.content: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.

paragraphs.content: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.

paragraphs.content: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The fear of the Lord is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
